full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I DGONGS RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GSAR SNYING GI MKHAS GRUB DU MA'I GSUNG BZHIN DU, ,ZHVA SER COD PAn 'DZIN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUB GRAGS PA'I SDES CHOS GR'A CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL NAS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
